data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grootaert, Patrick (2014): Mites of the genus Paracoroptes Lavoipierre, 1955 (Acariformes: Psoroptidae) — skin parasites of the African monkeys of the family Cercopithecidae (Primates). Zootaxa 3887 (2): 225-238, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3887.2.5
